item.title: 解决一场大辩论
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 协议失效，俄罗斯经乌克兰输往欧洲的天然气将中断
item.description: 在一项过境协议到期后，俄罗斯天然气将于周三停止经由乌克兰流向欧洲，这将对欧洲大陆的能源安全产生重大影响，因为欧洲大陆需要大量的天然气储备。【原文：Russian natural gas flows to Europe across Ukraine appear poised to halt Wednesday, after a transit deal expires, raising the stakes for the continent’s energy security as it draws heavily on reserves.】

item.title: Softchoice 将以 18 亿加元被收购，并从多伦多证券交易所退市
item.description: Softchoice 公司将被美国 World Wide Technology 公司全现金收购，预计这家云技术公司将在首次公开募股几年后从多伦多证券交易所退市。【原文：Softchoice Corp. will be acquired by US-based World Wide Technology in an all-cash deal that is expected to de-list the cloud tech firm from the Toronto Stock Exchange a few years after its initial public offering.】

item.title: 阿曼中央银行行长表示打算卸任
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份内部备忘录，阿曼央行行长塔希尔-阿姆里（Tahir Al Amri）告诉同事，他打算辞去央行行长一职。【原文：Oman’s central bank chief Tahir Al Amri told colleagues he intends to step down from the role, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg News, which didn’t give a timeframe or name a successor.】

item.title: 美联储降息反思推动美元上涨，创 2015 年以来最佳年景
item.description: 美元周二上涨，创下近十年来最强劲的年度涨幅，原因是美国经济稳健，以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的减税和关税政策有望使利率保持高位。【原文：The US dollar rose Tuesday, capping its strongest yearly advance in nearly a decade as the solid US economy and President-elect Donald Trump’s tax-cut and tariff policies promise to keep interest rates elevated.】

item.title: 纽约市出租车乱象的根源在于数十年的不作为和 "大规模 "欺诈行为
item.description:
当局正在努力控制保险公司ATIC破产所造成的损失。该公司称自己是广泛欺诈行为的受害者，但纳税人、出租车司机和消费者可能要为此买单。【原文：

Authorities are struggling to contain the damage from insurer ATIC’s insolvency. The company says it’s a victim of widespread fraud, but taxpayers, cab drivers and consumers risk footing the bill.

】

item.title: 美国房价增长略有放缓，因为购房者获得了更多筹码
item.description: 由于购房者的议价能力增强，10 月份美国房价增长放缓。【原文：Home-price growth in the US slowed in October as buyers gained more bargaining power.】

item.title: 政治风险加剧，法国股市 2024 年亏损突出
item.description: 在经历了一年的政治动荡之后，法国股市在主要同业股票中跌幅最大，2024 年末法国股市以亏损告终，而大多数欧洲和美国基准股票则取得了两位数的涨幅。【原文：French stocks stand out as losers among major peers after a year of political upheaval, ending 2024 with a loss while most European and US benchmarks notched double-digit gains.】

item.title: 马士基认为美国港口谈判毫无进展，敦促将货物运走
item.description: 全球第二大集装箱承运商敦促客户在 1 月 15 日码头工人及其雇主的最后期限之前将货物从美国东海岸和墨西哥湾港口运走，以避免在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职前几天可能发生的罢工。【原文：The world’s No. 2 container carrier urged customers to remove cargo from East and Gulf Coast ports in the US before a Jan. 15 deadline for dockworkers and their employers to avoid a possible strike just days before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.】

item.title: 在人工智能蓬勃发展之际，威斯特成为自 2001 年以来首家跻身 S&P 500 强的公用事业公司
item.description: Vistra Corp. 刚刚完成了一项自 2001 年以来从未有过的壮举：它以令人瞠目的 264% 的年涨幅在 S&P 500 指数排行榜上名列前茅。【原文：Vistra Corp. just pulled off a feat that no other utility stock has managed since 2001 — it topped the leaderboard of the S&P 500 Index with an eye-popping 264% annual gain.】

item.title: 中国 12 月成屋销售持平显示稳定迹象
item.description: 中国 12 月份的住宅销售环比持平，避免了 2024 年大部分时间出现的低迷，反映出政府大举刺激经济后市场趋于稳定的迹象。【原文：China’s residential property sales in December were flat on-year, avoiding a downturn seen much of 2024 and reflecting signs of market stabilization after the government’s stimulus blitz.】

item.title: 新兴市场乏善可陈，风险最高的债券大放异彩
item.description: 世界上一些最弱经济体的美元债券已成为新兴市场资产今年又一低迷中的亮点。【原文：Dollar bonds from some of the world’s weakest economies have emerged as the bright spot in what’s otherwise been yet another lackluster year for emerging-market assets.】

item.title: 波多黎各停电，几乎全岛陷入黑暗
item.description: 周二上午，脆弱的电网发生故障，导致全岛停电，波多黎各近 90% 的家庭断电。【原文：Almost 90% of households in Puerto Rico were without electricity Tuesday morning after a failure in the fragile power grid caused an island-wide blackout.】

item.title: 可可在供应担忧和贸易稀缺的情况下于 2024 年年底大幅上涨
item.description: 可可将在 2024 年成为表现最好的主要商品，其巨大的年度涨幅是由供应担忧和市场波动造成的。【原文：Cocoa is finishing 2024 as the top-performing major commodity, its massive annual gain driven by supply fears and market volatility.】

item.title: 乌克兰液化天然气转运协议结束，新加入者旨在提高供应量
item.description: 乌克兰最大的私营能源公司 DTEK 计划每月向欧洲运送两到三批液化天然气，以加强其新的贸易业务。【原文：DTEK, Ukraine’s largest private energy company, plans to bring two to three liquefied natural gas cargoes a month into Europe as it ramps up its new trading business.】

item.title: 微软希望证明人工智能是工作场所的福音
item.description: 这一年，微软本应证明，向商业世界销售人工智能工具所能赚到的钱足以证明巨大的花费是值得的。随着 2024 年的结束，这一目标已经迈入了新的一年。但首先...【原文：This was the year Microsoft was supposed to demonstrate that the money to be made selling AI tools to the business world would justify the tremendous expense. As 2024 ends, that goal has moved into the New Year. But first...】

item.title: 英国央行面临 2025 年从税收到关税的经济风险
item.description: 我是汤姆-里斯，驻伦敦的英国经济记者。今天我们将探讨英格兰银行未来一年的工作。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Tom Rees, UK economy reporter in London. item.title: 关税前景开始令得克萨斯州制造商担忧
item.description: 根据达拉斯联邦储备银行的最新调查，关税的不确定性正在逐渐影响德克萨斯州制造商 2025 年的乐观前景。【原文：Tariff uncertainty is creeping into an otherwise optimistic outlook for Texas manufacturers in 2025, according to the latest survey from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 印尼在最后一刻取消增值税上调计划
item.description: 在公众呼声日益高涨的情况下，印度尼西亚在增值税税率计划于 1 月 1 日生效前几小时缩减了上调计划。【原文：Indonesia scaled back its planned increase in the value-added tax rate just hours before it was set to take effect on January 1 amid escalating public outcry.】

item.title: 50 万亿美元国债涌入将考验债券市场的管道系统
item.description: 市场日报》祝愿所有读者新年快乐、身体健康！我们将于周四继续报道。【原文：Markets Daily wishes all our readers a happy and healthy New Year! We’ll be back on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国离岸人民币在清淡交投中跌至 2022 年以来最低点
item.description: 离岸人民币周二大幅下跌，兑美元汇率一度跌至两年多来的最低水平，随后跌幅收窄。【原文：The offshore yuan tumbled sharply on Tuesday, briefly falling to the lowest level against the US dollar in more than two years, before paring the decline.】

item.title: 土耳其酿酒商 Anadolu Efes 在俄罗斯合资企业法令颁布后延续低迷走势
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京将土耳其酿酒商 Anadolu Efes 与 Anheuser-Busch InBev 合资企业的管理权移交给一家当地公司后，该公司股价将创下自 2001 年以来的最大两日跌幅。【原文：The shares of Turkish brewer Anadolu Efes were set for their biggest two-day loss since 2001 after Russia’s President Vladimir Putin handed management of the firm’s joint venture with Anheuser-Busch InBev to a local company.】

item.title: 新加坡增长超出预期，黄总理强调全球风险
item.description: 新加坡总理黄遵宪表示，新加坡经济在2024年的表现好于预期，为这个城市国家明年面对更复杂的国际环境奠定了坚实的基础。【原文：Singapore’s Prime Minister Lawrence Wong said the country’s economy performed better than expected in 2024, building a strong foundation for the city state to confront a more complex international environment next year.】

item.title: 南非 Transnet 以经济复苏受阻为由扩大亏损
item.description: 南非国有铁路和港口运营商报告上半年亏损扩大，原因是基础设施瘫痪和安全问题继续阻碍其扭亏为盈的进程【原文：South Africa’s state-owned rail and ports operator reported a wider first-half loss as failing infrastructure and security issues continue to hamper progress in turning the business around】

item.title: 中国人民银行年底推出新工具加大流动性注入力度
item.description: 中国央行在 12 月份注入了 1.7 万亿元人民币（合 2,330 亿美元）现金，在年底加大了对经济和金融市场的流动性支持。【原文：China’s central bank injected 1.7 trillion yuan ($233 billion) of cash in December, dialing up liquidity support for the economy and financial markets at year-end.】

item.title: 瑞安航空飞往维也纳的航班因 GPS 干扰而改道：新闻报
item.description: 据《新闻报》（Die Presse）报道，瑞安航空控股公司一架从里加飞往维也纳的航班在两次尝试降落后，由于 GPS 设备受到干扰而流产，于周一晚些时候改道飞往附近的捷克共和国布尔诺。【原文：A Ryanair Holdings Plc flight from Riga to Vienna was diverted to nearby Brno, in the Czech Republic, late Monday after two aborted landing attempts due to jammed GPS devices, according to Die Presse newspaper.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气因预计乌克兰过境期结束而上涨
item.description: 由于俄罗斯与乌克兰之间的过境协议将于元旦到期，预计经乌克兰过境的俄罗斯天然气将停止流动，欧洲天然气价格上涨。【原文：European natural gas prices rose in anticipation of a halt in Russian flows via Ukraine on New Year’s Day, as a transit agreement between the two nations expires.】

item.title: 棕榈油暴涨后，印尼面临代价高昂的生物燃料扩张
item.description: 印尼消费者、燃料零售商和棕榈油生产商正面临着政府扩大生物燃料计划所带来的更高成本。【原文：Indonesian consumers, fuel retailers and palm oil producers are facing higher costs from the government’s plan to expand its biofuel program after the price of the tropical oil surged.】

item.title: 南非兰特八年来首次成为新兴市场领先货币
item.description: 据法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）和阿什莫尔集团（Ashmore Group Plc）的分析师称，南非兰特自2016年以来首次跻身本年度表现最佳的五种新兴市场货币之列，而且未来可能还会有更多。【原文：For the first time since 2016, South Africa‘s rand finds itself among the five best-performing emerging-market currencies of the year — and there may be more to come, according to analysts at Credit Agricole SA and Ashmore Group Plc.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉将在 2024 年底出现 2020 年以来最小跌幅
item.description: 受当局推动实际升值以及土耳其里拉在高利率环境下对套息交易投资者的吸引力的影响，土耳其里拉有望在2024年年底创下2020年以来的最小年度跌幅。【原文：Turkey’s lira is on track to close 2024 with its smallest annual decline since 2020, driven by the authorities’ push for real appreciation and the currency’s appeal to carry-trade investors amid high interest rates.】
